abstract: Folk singer Flo Morrissey, who is releasing debut album Tomorrow Will Be Beautiful, relaxes in several bohemian-styled outfits.
lead_paragraph: Upon the release of her poetic debut album, "Tomorrow Will Be Beautiful," the folk singer Flo Morrissey pauses to enjoy the tender subtlety of fashion’s new bohemianism.
snippet: Upon the release of her poetic debut album, "Tomorrow Will Be Beautiful," the folk singer Flo Morrissey pauses to enjoy the tender subtlety of fashion’s new bohemianism.
